entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:06 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -43.0°C

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 41.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 41. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 43 with temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43 with temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
